projects.Title: MNT Plus
projects.Title2: MNT Plus – Minimal CMMS (Computerized Maintenance Management System)
projects.Description: MNT Plus is a lightweight Minimal CMMS desktop application built with WPF. It focuses on core maintenance workflows — asset management, work orders, preventive schedules, and maintenance history — in an intuitive Windows-native UI for small and medium businesses.
Features: Asset & equipment inventory with details and status
Work order creation, assignment and status tracking
CSV import/export for assets and work orders

projects.Title: Hospital Pharmacy Drug Store (EPSP)
projects.Description: A WPF desktop application designed to manage the medicine inventory of a hospital pharmacy within an EPSP institution. It provides functionalities to track stock levels, register incoming and outgoing movements, and generate accurate reports to support decision-making.
Features: Full management of medicines (add, update, delete)
Track incoming supplies and outgoing distributions

projects.Title: Hospital Patient & Prescription Management (EPSP)
projects.Description: A WPF desktop application developed for an EPSP hospital to manage patient records and prescriptions. It allows registering patients, creating medical prescriptions, lab test requests, and tracking their medical history within the hospital system.
Features: Patient registration and personal data management
Generate lab test requests (blood test, imaging, etc.)
Reports and export features for prescriptions and analyses
